# Dairy Management System - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
Comprehensive dairy business management system built with React, TypeScript, Vite, and Tailwind CSS.

## Completed Steps

- [x] Create workspace structure and setup instructions
- [x] Scaffold React + TypeScript + Vite project
- [x] Setup design system and themes
- [x] Build authentication module
- [x] Create main dashboard layout
- [x] Implement production module
- [x] Build stock & inventory module
- [x] Create orders & deliveries module
- [x] Implement clients module
- [x] Build invoicing & finance module
- [x] Create reports & analytics module
- [x] Implement administration & settings
- [x] Add routing and state management
- [x] Create reusable component library
- [x] Create documentation

## Next Steps
- [ ] Install dependencies and test compilation
- [ ] Run development server
- [ ] Test all features and modules

## Project Structure
All components, pages, and features have been created according to specifications.
